data.actual_result: The nitro animation activates and then stops randomly
data.expected_result: The animation that happens when you activate nitro should not activate
data.short_description: Nitro animation even when the given code is incorrect
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the nitro tab and scroll all the way down - Click on `Enter the code here!` - Give in a random code and press activate (also works with used cupons)
